pages.text: The $(thing)Mineralis Ritual$() is exceptionally important, as it's the only way to obtain a variety of precious, and important, ores and gemstones such as $(item)Osmium$() or $(item)Black Quartz$().

pages.title: Ore list
pages.text: The ores that can be obtained from the $(thing)Mineralis Ritual$() include: $(br2)$(item)$(li)Osmium$(li)Uranium$(li)Boron$(li)Lithium$(li)Thorium$(li)Magnesium$(li)Black Quartz$(li)Certus Quartz$(li)Ruby$(li)Sapphire
